QuestData.Title: Mending Old Wounds
QuestData.CompletionText: You'd better think twice before setting foot in Ratchet, $n! Word's been getting around of your dirty deeds.$b$bYou're in luck though, a ship just arrived with many wounded from an encounter with the Bloodsail Buccaneers. This is your chance to prove you're not a complete scoundrel. Lend us a hand by bringing linen cloth for bandages and empty vials for potions.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm happy you're seeing the error of your ways, $N. Keep the supplies coming; we're not going to forget about you so easily, $Gmister:miss;!
